column5: Normandy is the coziest of our rooms, and is paneled in knotty pine. It is located upstairs in the Great Hall. This room features a queen sized bed, matching dresser and is individually climate-controlled. The semi-private bathroom with claw-footed tub is shared between Aquitaine and Normandy.  Castle guests receive free admission to the Faire and Celtic Festival if they occur during their stay.  View all our rooms: https://www.airbnb.com/s?host_id=14519831
